item.description:
Come out and enjoy Korean drink and tapas/dinner at Myung Dong in Allston. And enjoy the K pop playing on the TV screens.

By T - take B train (Green Line) and get off at Comm. Ave and Harvard Ave intersection and walk a few blocks down Harvard Ave

Parking - is always tough in this area. Sometimes there are more spots on Brighton Ave towards Super 88 food court.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside the restaurant to meet & greet.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Korean food and Soju @ Myung Dong
